div.style: background:#FFF; border:thin; border-color:#060; width:100%; text-align:left; index=1000;

font.a: Click here for All news regarding HLCS and the Corona Virus

br.font: Welcome to Houghton Lake Community Schools
br.p: Welcome to our school district. We are an award winning district with amazing teachers, wonderful staff, and most of all, outstanding students. We invite you to explore our web site and learn more about our school. Go Bobcats!

p.br:
Providing an exceptional learning community which inspires
the whole child through excellent instruction.
Every Student
Every Classroom
Every Day

We will be an outstanding Pre K-12 school district where all students
are provided the tools and skills to reach their full potential.

div.p: About Us | Driving Directions | Contact Us
6001 W. Houghton Lake Drive, Houghton Lake, MI 48629 | Phone 989-366-2035 | Fax 989-422-6606
